title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authenticaion vs. Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorizaion means being allowed access to the system

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: Check out Sequelize! It allows you to model your data as Javascript classes!
